pages.text: Elixir cultivators were a type of spiritual cultivator. They refined and consumed elixir that absorbed spiritual from heaven and earth to increase their cultivation. This was the choice of most humans to cultivate.

pages.title: Cushion
pages.text: Sit on cushion can see cultivation gui.

pages.title: Spiritual Level 1
pages.text: Taking this kind of elixir can help break through to spiritual level I.

pages.title: Spiritual Level 2
pages.text: Taking this kind of elixir can help break through to spiritual level II.

pages.title: Spiritual Level 3
pages.text: Taking this kind of elixir can help break through to spiritual level III.
